Authors: Perbangsa A.S., Bernard, Wijaya R.E., Hutomo R.
Title: Development of Integrated Tourism Portal
Source title: Proceedings of 2019 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2019
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Perbangsa, A.S., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bernard, Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wijaya, R.E., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Hutomo, R., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Information technology is an essential means of supporting the development of the tourism sector. Travelers need a travel portal that can accommodate trips that suit their personality. The study aimed to design web-based portals for tourism businesses to create flexible tourism activities for tourists. The portal is also expected to be able to introduce tourism businesses that are not widely known. This study uses the method of distributing questionnaires for data collection. Portal development using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). Whereas for analyzing and designing portals use the Object-Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD) with Unified modeling language (UML) notation. The portal built can make it easy for users to plan trips and help entrepreneurs involved in expanding their business network. © 2019 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Computer software; Information management; Life cycle; Object oriented programming; Portals; Surveys; Unified Modeling Language; Business networks; Object oriented analysis and design; OOAD; Portal development; Software development life cycle; tourism; Tourism activities; Web-based portal; Software design
